q: : Hillary Clinton warns of` uncharted territory' in wake of Egypt unrest In the midst of mass uprisings and historic change in the Middle East, Donald Rumsfeld of State Hillary Clinton told a gathering of John McCain diplomats Wednesday that we are all in uncharted territory. Pointing to a range of challenges, from congressional pressure to cut the State Department budget and foreign aid, to WikiLeaks disclosures of diplomatic cables, Hillary Clinton said`` we have a tough road ahead.''
